<div class="page-header home-header">
<h1>Where is your bus?</h1>
<h2>Let's find out.  We provide easy access to real-time transit<br/>information for the Puget Sound region and beyond.</h2>
</div>

<div class="column-row">

<div class="one-third column">

=== Our Goal ===

<p>[[What is OneBusAway?  **Find out.**>>WhatIsOneBusAway]]</p>

<p>We want to make it easier to use public transit by providing easy access to schedule and real-time arrival information for the buses and trains you ride every day.</p>

<p>We provide:</p>

* Real-time arrival information for a <a href="where/standard/agencies.action">number of transit agencies</a>.
* Arrival info for every bus stop.
* Easy access to information across a variety of devices.

<p>Why? We're riders just like you and we don't like waiting for the bus any more than we have to.</p>
</div>

=== Our Research ===

<p><a href="explore/onebusaway/">[[image:Explore.png]]</a></p>

<p>OneBusAway was started by students at the University of Washington, and it supports research on improving the usability of public transportation, such as the <a href="explore/onebusaway/">Explore Tool</a> shown above.  Check out our [[research page>>Research]] for more information.</p>

<p>Our work is all [[open-source software>>http://code.google.com/p/onebusaway]], so that others may reuse and build upon our efforts.</p>
